statements: SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, loyalty_points FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points < 50 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, loyalty_points FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_spent ASC, loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 50 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, loyalty_points FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points < 20 ORDER BY email;
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email, loyalty_points, total_spent FROM high_value_customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_campaign, campaign_cost FROM marketing_efforts WHERE campaign_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY last_purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM high_value_customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, marketing_campaign, campaign_cost FROM high_value_customers JOIN marketing_efforts ON high_value_customers.customer_id = marketing_efforts.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_id > 200;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM high_value_customers JOIN customer_transactions ON high_value_customers.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN customer_transactions ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = customer_transactions.customer_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM high_value_customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT cp.purchase_id, cp.purchase_amount, hc.name FROM customer_purchases cp JOIN high_value_customers hc ON cp.customer_id = hc.id;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT hc.name, lp.program_name FROM high_value_customers hc JOIN loyalty_program lp ON hc.id = lp.program_id;
SELECT AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_purchase_amount FROM customer_purchases;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, segment_description FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT customer_name, segment_name FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id WHERE segment_id = 1;
